reg_info.act_under: Ontario Energy Board Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur la Commission de l’énergie de l’Ontario

content.content: 11. Chatham Resources Ltd. is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect of the transfer to it of the ownership of the shares of Fisherville Gas Ltd. and the shares of Glenerd Limited. O. Reg. 224/91, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 11. Chatham Resources Ltd. is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect of the transfer to it of the ownership of the shares of Fisherville Gas Ltd. and the shares of Glenerd Limited. O. Reg. 224/91, s. 1.

content.content: 13. Stanley Alvey Boyt is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect to the transfer of ownership of shares of Wellandport Gas Company Limited to Stanley Alvey Boyt. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 869, s. 13.
content.raw_html: 13. Stanley Alvey Boyt is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect to the transfer of ownership of shares of Wellandport Gas Company Limited to Stanley Alvey Boyt. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 869, s. 13.

content.content: 15.2 The Six Nations of the Grand River is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect of the transfer of ownership of the shares of George Hyslop Construction Limited to the Six Nations of the Grand River. O. Reg. 300/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 15.2 The Six Nations of the Grand River is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect of the transfer of ownership of the shares of George Hyslop Construction Limited to the Six Nations of the Grand River. O. Reg. 300/94, s. 1.

content.content: 15.3 George Hyslop Construction Limited is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (1) of the Act in respect of the disposition of its gas distribution system to the Six Nations of the Grand River. O. Reg. 300/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 15.3 George Hyslop Construction Limited is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (1) of the Act in respect of the disposition of its gas distribution system to the Six Nations of the Grand River. O. Reg. 300/94, s. 1.

content.content: 15.4 Six Nations of the Grand River is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (1) of the Act in respect of the disposition of its gas distribution system to the Six Nations Natural Gas Limited Partnership. O. Reg. 300/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 15.4 Six Nations of the Grand River is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (1) of the Act in respect of the disposition of its gas distribution system to the Six Nations Natural Gas Limited Partnership. O. Reg. 300/94, s. 1.

content.content: 15.5 Glenn Robins is exempted from the operation of subsection 26 (1) of the Act in respect of the disposition of his gas distribution system to Superior View Gas Inc. O. Reg. 793/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 15.5 Glenn Robins is exempted from the operation of subsection 26 (1) of the Act in respect of the disposition of his gas distribution system to Superior View Gas Inc. O. Reg. 793/94, s. 1.

content.content: 15.6 Centra Gas Utilities Inc. is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect of the transfer of ownership of all the common shares of Union Gas Limited from Centra Gas Inc. to Centra Gas Utilities Inc. O. Reg. 360/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 15.6 Centra Gas Utilities Inc. is exempted from the operation of or compliance with subsection 26 (2) of the Act in respect of the transfer of ownership of all the common shares of Union Gas Limited from Centra Gas Inc. to Centra Gas Utilities Inc. O. Reg. 360/98, s. 1.
